sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer

Class CustomerPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer.CustomerPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class CustomerPanel
extends java.awt.Dialog
    This class Customer Panel display the GUI interactive with the Customer. This panel simulates the vending machine's customer interface panel. It will enable the user (Customer) to:
    1. insert coins;
    2. select Brands;
    3. terminate Transaction.
    It will also provide the following display functions;
    1. display total money inserted.
    2. indicate coin not valid.
    3. indicate no change available.
    4. display the value of the change to be collected.
    5. display an icon representing the dispensed drink.
    Version:
    1.0 2008-10-01
    Author:
    Team SE16T5E
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CustomerPanel(java.awt.Frame fr, TransactionController ctrl)
      This constructor creates an instance of the Customer Panel. It further creates Invalid Coin Display, No Change Available Display, Refund/ Change Tray Display, Total Money Inserted Display, Coin Input Box, Drink Selection Box, Can Collection Box and Terminate Button.
